Name: zho-anonymousgroupo-la
Author: Anonymous Group Of Translators
Source: Goodword Books , http://www.goodwordbooks.com/ , Center for Peace and Spirituality , https://www.cpsglobal.org/

Translations.Text: Yi qiongcang he qi mingxing mengshi
ni zen neng zhidao qi mingxing shi shenme
Mei geren dou youyige baohu zhe
Jiao ren sixiang yixia, ta ziji shi yong shenme zaocheng de
ta shi shechu de jingye zaocheng de
Na jingye shi cong jizhu he leigu zhi jian fachu de
Zhenzhu que shi neng 448	di baqi zhang zhizun (ai er la) shi ta fuyuan de
na shi zai yiqie mimi bei jiechuan zhi ri
Ta jue meiyou nengli, ye meiyou yuanzhu zhe
he you feng di di fashi
zhe que shi fenbie zhen wei de yanci
Suoyi ni dang kuanxian bu xindao de renmen, ni dang kuanxian tamen yixia.ยง
